collisionSql.where: not exists (select 1 from job_headers h,job_lines l where h.header_id = l.header_id and line_id = ${@line_id} and h.status = 'DOWN')
collisionSql.message: 提交时间已过，不能提交！

collisionSql.where: not exists (select 1 from job_lines where line_id = ${@line_id} and status = 'NEW')
